statusDetails.message:
The following asserts failed:
	User : 'error_user', Product: 'Sauce Labs Backpack', Product description mismatch expected [carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection.] but found [A description should be here, but it failed to render! This error has been reported to Backtrace.],
	User : 'error_user', Product: 'Sauce Labs Bike Light', Product description mismatch expected [A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding your bike at night. Water-resistant with 3 lighting modes, 1 AAA battery included.] but found [A description should be here, but it failed to render! This error has been reported to Backtrace.],
	User : 'error_user', Product: 'Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt', Product description mismatch expected [Get your testing superhero on with the Sauce Labs bolt T-shirt. From American Apparel, 100% ringspun combed cotton, heather gray with red bolt.] but found [A description should be here, but it failed to render! This error has been reported to Backtrace.],
	User : 'error_user', Product: 'Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket', Product description mismatch expected [It's not every day that you come across a midweight quarter-zip fleece jacket capable of handling everything from a relaxing day outdoors to a busy day at the office.] but found [A description should be here, but it failed to render! This error has been reported to Backtrace.],
	User : 'error_user', Product: 'Sauce Labs Onesie', Product description mismatch expected [Rib snap infant onesie for the junior automation engineer in development. Reinforced 3-snap bottom closure, two-needle hemmed sleeved and bottom won't unravel.] but found [A description should be here, but it failed to render! This error has been reported to Backtrace.],
	User : 'error_user', Product: 'Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)', Product description mismatch expected [This classic Sauce Labs t-shirt is perfect to wear when cozying up to your keyboard to automate a few tests. Super-soft and comfy ringspun combed cotton.] but found [A description should be here, but it failed to render! This error has been reported to Backtrace.]
